articles.author: Dan Goodin
articles.title: iOS and Android juice jacking defenses have been trivial to bypass for years - Ars Technica
articles.description: New ChoiceJacking attack allows malicious chargers to steal data from phones.

articles.title: Breakthrough Discovery: A Massive Glowing Hydrogen Cloud Found Near Our Solar System - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Scientists have uncovered a colossal, previously hidden hydrogen cloud, named Eos, just 300 light-years from Earth — the closest such discovery ever. Detected by its faint ultraviolet glow, Eos offers an unprecedented opportunity to study how stars are born. …
articles.content: Hidden for eons, Eos—a vast hydrogen cloud near Earth—has been revealed through ultraviolet light, potentially revolutionizing how scientists explore the birthplaces of stars. Credit: Thomas Müller (… [+8192 chars]

articles.author: Jamie Carter
articles.title: Space photo of the week: Iconic 'Eagle Nebula' gets a major glow-up on Hubble's 35th anniversary - Live Science
articles.description: One of the Hubble Space Telescope's most iconic images has been reprocessed using the latest techniques.
articles.content:
What it is: The Eagle Nebula (Messier 16)
Where it is: 7,000 light-years away, in the constellation Serpens
When it was shared: April 18, 2025
